description:
The table provides a comprehensive monthly overview of customer engagement within the app, 
capturing data related to accumulated points, usage patterns, and relevant metrics, 
facilitating in-depth analysis of user behavior and app performance.

columns.rmid: The term RMID can stand for various things depending on the context, and without specific information, it's challenging to provide a precise description. If you have a specific domain or context in mind, please provide additional details so that I can offer a more accurate description within the token limit.
columns.ntx_financial_out: The number of financial transactions that have been paid out.
columns.n_topup_point_onboard: The number of time to topup onboard
columns.n_transfer_point_out: Number of times received from other users
columns.n_transfer_point_in: The number of times the score was transferred to other people.
columns.n_purchase: The number of times caused by all payment.
columns.n_purchase_qr: The number of times caused by payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.n_purchase_sku: The number of times caused by payment via X-Store.
columns.n_purchase_pyw: The number of times caused by payment via Paywise.
columns.n_purchase_pyw_rbh: The number of times caused by payment via Robinhood Platform.
columns.n_purchase_qr_29: The number of times caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QR 29.
columns.n_purchase_qr_30: The number of times caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QR 30.
columns.n_purchase_qr_cs: The number of times caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QRCS.
columns.n_payment_p_only: The number of times caused by payment by Payment Method is the use of Point Only.
columns.n_payment_p_casa: The number of times caused by Payment by Payment Method is the use of POINT, plus the payment by transferring money.
columns.n_payment_p_cc: The number of times caused by Payment by Payment Method is the use of POINT, plus payment via credit cards.
columns.amt_point_topup: The number of points caused by all topups
columns.amt_point_transfer_out: The number of points that transferred to other users
columns.amt_point_transfer_in: The number of points that received points from other users
columns.amt_point_pay: The number of points caused by all payment
columns.amt_point_pay_qr: The number of points caused by payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.amt_point_pay_sku: The number of points caused by payment via X-Store.
columns.amt_point_pay_pyw: The number of points caused by payment via Paywise.
columns.amt_point_pay_pyw_rbh: The number of points caused by payment via Robinhood Platform.
columns.amt_point_pay_qr_29: The number of points caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QR 29.
columns.amt_point_pay_qr_30: The number of points caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QR 30.
columns.amt_point_pay_qr_cs: The number of points caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QRCS.
columns.amt_point_payment_p_only: The number of points caused by payment by Payment Method is the use of Point Only.
columns.amt_point_payment_p_casa: The number of points caused by payment by Payment Method is the use of Point, plus payment by transferring money.
columns.amt_point_payment_p_cc: The number of points caused by payment by Payment Method is the use of Point, plus payment through credit cards.
columns.revenue_margin_pay_sku: Margin caused by payment via X-Store.
columns.revenue_margin_pay_qr: Margin caused by payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.revenue_margin_pay_pyw: Margin caused by payment via Paywise.
columns.price_purchase_qr_pointvalue: The value of POINT using Payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.price_purchase_qr_money: The amount of payment via Scan & Pay
columns.price_purchase_qr_itemprice: Total value that uses Payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.price_purchase_pyw_pointvalue: Value of POINT using Payment through Paywise
columns.price_purchase_pyw_money: The amount of payment via Paywise
columns.price_purchase_pyw_itemprice: Total value that uses Payment via Paywise.
columns.price_purchase_sku_pointvalue: The value of POINT using Payment via X-Store.
columns.price_purchase_sku_money: The amount of payment via X-Store
columns.price_purchase_sku_itemprice_point: Actual Point Required Per unit of X-Store
columns.days_visit: Number of days entering the app
columns.days_topup_point: The number of days that came to do all the topups.
columns.days_topup_point_onetime: Number of days that come to do Manual Topup
columns.days_transfer_point_out: Number of days enteredThat transferred to other users
columns.days_transfer_point_in: Number of days enteredThat received points from other users
columns.days_purchase: The number of days that came to payment all
columns.days_purchase_qr: Number of days to payment via Scan & Pay
columns.days_purchase_sku: Number of days to payment via X-Store
columns.days_purchase_pyw: The number of days to payment via Paywise
columns.date_from_last_visit: The latest day that entered the App
columns.date_from_last_financial: The latest day with Financial Transaction
columns.date_from_last_purchase_qr: The latest day of payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.date_from_last_purchase_sku: The latest day of payment via X-Store.
columns.date_from_last_purchase_pyw: The latest day of payment via Paywise
columns.date_from_last_point_topup_onetime: The latest day with Manual top
columns.date_from_last_point_topup_auto: The latest day with Auto Converse Topup
columns.date_from_last_point_transfer_out: The latest day that has been transferred to other users
columns.date_from_last_point_transfer_in: The latest day that has been received from other users
columns.date_first_financial: The first day with Financial Transaction
columns.date_last_financial: The latest day with Financial Transaction
columns.date_first_purchase_qr: The first day of payment via Scan & Pay
columns.date_last_purchase_qr: The latest day of payment via Scan & Pay.
columns.date_first_purchase_sku: The first day of payment via X-Store
columns.date_last_purchase_sku: The latest day of payment via X-Store.
columns.date_first_purchase_pyw: The first day of payment via Paywise
columns.date_last_purchase_pyw: The latest day of payment via Paywise
columns.cust_ptx_tenure: Number of days from Register Date to the present
columns.cust_ptx_tenure_mth: Number of months from Register Date to the present
columns.days_from_last_visit: Number of days from the latest app entering the App to the present
columns.days_from_last_financial: The number of days from the latest day with Financial Transaction to the present day.
columns.days_from_last_purchase: The number of days from the latest day that has been paidment to the present.
columns.days_from_last_purchase_sku: The number of days from the latest date of Payment via X-Store to the present.
columns.days_from_last_purchase_qr: The number of days from the latest day that has been paidment via Scan & Pay to the present.
columns.days_from_last_purchase_pyw: The number of days from the latest day that has been payment through Paywiset to the present.
columns.days_from_last_point_topup_auto: The number of days from the latest day with Auto Converse top up to the present.
columns.days_from_last_point_topup_onetime: The number of days from the latest day with Manual top to the present.
columns.days_from_last_point_transfer_out: The number of days from the latest day that has been transferred to other users to the present day.
columns.days_from_last_point_transfer_in: The number of days from the latest day that has been received from other users to the present.
